item.description:
Meet/park at Sanford Brown formerly Gibbs College in Cranston and enjoy a ride on the bike path. This is an easy ride as the path is flat. Please arrive at 9:45am.

We can stop at one of the two ice cream shops ("Sundaes" or "Just Chillin" that are along the path on our return ride to the parking lot.

Let's meet at the train tracks far right side of the Sanford Brown building; plenty of parking. How to find me ... I'll be wearing a light blue short sleeve top and I'll be standing there with my bike.

Here's a link of RI bike paths; scroll down to "Washington Secondary Bike Path" for a map of the path. Details about the bike paths are below each map. http://www.rigreenways.org/paths/g-way-mp.htm

The forecast is predicting a beautiful day with 0% chance of rain.  Rain will cancel the event.

Please arrive at 9:45am so that we can be on the path at 10:00am.  Remember to bring water.
item.name: Cranston Bike Path 11 mile ride (5.5 miles each way)
